params.communityAddress: Address of the community that has been added
params.maxTranche: Value of the maxTranche For further information regarding each parameter, see *Community* smart contract initialize method.

params.managers: Addresses of the new community's initial managers

params.communityAddress: Address of the community that has been removed

params._claimAmount: base amount to be claim by the beneficiary
params._decreaseStep: value decreased from maxClaim for every beneficiary added
params._incrementInterval: increment interval used in each claim
params._maxClaim: limit that a beneficiary can claim at in total
params._maxTranche: maximum amount that the community will receive when requesting funds
params._minTranche: minimum amount that the community will receive when requesting funds

params._account: address to be added as community manager

fundCommunity().details: Funds an existing community if it hasn't enough funds

params._communityTemplate: Address of the Community implementation                              used for deploying new communities

params._previousCommunity: address of the community to be migrated

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._claimAmount: base amount to be claim by the beneficiary
params._decreaseStep: value decreased from maxClaim each time a is beneficiary added
params._incrementInterval: increment interval used in each claim
params._maxClaim: limit that a beneficiary can claim  in total

params._maxTranche: maximum amount that the community will receive when requesting funds
params._minTranche: minimum amount that the community will receive when requesting funds

params._newCommunityTemplate: address of the new communityTemplate contract

params._newTreasury: address of the new treasury contract

CommunityAdded(address,address[],uint256.notice: Triggered when a community has been added

CommunityFunded(address,uint256).notice: Triggered when a community has been funded

CommunityMigrated(address[],address,addr.notice: Triggered when a community has been migrated

CommunityRemoved(address).notice: Triggered when a community has been removed

CommunityTemplateUpdated(address,address.notice: Triggered when the communityTemplate address has been updated

TransferERC20(address,address,uint256).notice: Triggered when an amount of an ERC20 has been transferred from this contract to an address

TreasuryUpdated(address,address).notice: Triggered when the treasury address has been updated

addManagerToCommunity(address,address).notice: Adds a new manager to a community

communityListAt(uint256).notice: Returns the address of a community from communityList

initialize(address,address).notice: Used to initialize a new CommunityAdmin contract

migrateCommunity(address[],address).notice: Migrates a community by deploying a new contract.

removeCommunity(address).notice: Removes an existing community. All community funds are transferred to the treasury

transfer(address,address,uint256).notice: Transfers an amount of an ERC20 from this contract to an address

transferFromCommunity(address,address,ad.notice: Transfers an amount of an ERC20 from  community to an address

updateBeneficiaryParams(address,uint256,.notice: Updates the beneficiary params of a community

updateCommunityTemplate(address).notice: Updates the address of the the communityTemplate

updateProxyImplementation(address,addres.notice: Updates proxy implementation address of a community

updateTreasury(address).notice: Updates the address of the treasury

userdoc.notice: Welcome to CommunityAdmin, the main contract. This is an administrative (for now) contract where the admins have control over the list of communities. Being only able to add and remove communities
